Description: Crystalline sandstone seated figure of Rahotep; upper part lost.
Curator's comments: Published Kitchen, Ram. Insc. Vol 3 p65; PM viii, p. 544. Published: HTBM Part 9: Plate XIV Translation: Maystre, Les grands pretres de Ptah de Memphis (OBO 113): p.304-306
Bibliographic references: James 1970 / Hieroglyphic texts from Egyptian stelae, etc., in the British Museum, Part 9. (Pl.14)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1995 Feb-May, Atlanta, Emory University, Reflections of Women in the New Kingdom 1998/9 Oct-Jun, South Carolina, The Charleston Museum, Queens & Commoners of the New Kingdom
Acquisition name: Donated by: Dr Charles Davies Sherborn
